title: Radar
description: The schema for the tech-radar-generator data.

rings.description: The names of up to four rings, ordered from centre to outside

blips.description: The blips on the tech radar

quadrant.description: The quadrant of the radar the blip should appear in

ring.description: The ring on the radar the blip should appear in. Must take one of the provided ring values

isNew.description: True if the blip has been created or modified recently

description.description: A short summary of the blip and why it is in the current ring
